subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Daro Leonardo Conca, an Argentine who was named best soccer player in Brazil for two consecutive years, joined China’s Guangzhou Evergrande for a record $10 million, the club said.
snippet: Daro Leonardo Conca, an Argentine who was named best soccer player in Brazil for two consecutive years, joined China’s Guangzhou Evergrande for a record $10 million, the club said.
